name: Asteroid Barrage
description:
Travel in Space and defend yourself from bombardment of asteroids. Stay in your position and survive. Test your skills and reflex while surviving the barrage of multiple asteroids.

Note: This is an open-source program. Thus, redistribution and modification of any source code and other affiliated are not prohibited, however, there is no such warranty after using the said product. The contributor is not liable to any changes and modification that the users done.

Donations and supports to the developer will greatly help the future projects and his/her other digital materials. However, it is only voluntary and not mandated to be done.
